closed_reason: Created tk migrate command with internal/migrate package. Migrates run records from embedded 'run' field in tick JSON files to separate .tick/logs/records/<id>.json files, then removes the 'run' field. Includes --dry-run flag, comprehensive tests, and idempotent behavior (reports 'No migrations needed' when already migrated). Successfully migrated 101 existing run records.
description: Create a migration that reads 'run' field from all tick JSON files and writes to .tick/runlog/<tick-id>.json, then removes the 'run' field from the tick. Can be a one-time script or part of tk init/upgrade.
title: Migrate existing run data from tick JSON files to .tick/runlog/
